metadata.title: CVE-2017-7653 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The Eclipse Mosquitto broker up to version 1.4.15 does not reject strings that are not valid UTF-8. A malicious client could cause other clients that do reject invalid UTF-8 strings to disconnect themselves from the broker by sending a topic string which is not valid UTF-8, and so cause a denial of service for the clients.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-7653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 1.5.4-1
libmosquittopp1 - 1.5.4-1
mosquitto - 1.5.4-1
mosquitto-clients - 1.5.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.4-1').
